xmlconfig.CreditNoteDocument: Configure the system wide file name pattern for all pdf credit note documents generated by the system. The system will substitute in the configured CreditNotePrefix if you include {CreditNotePrefix} in the value. The system will substitute in the credit note identifier for each individual credit note document if you include {CreditNoteID} in the PdfFileNamePattern. The system will substitute in the credit note string for each individual credit note document if you include {CreditNoteString} in the PdfFileNamePattern. optional parameters you can also include: UserName, AccountID, FristName, LastName, CompanyName, MM, M, DD, D, YYYY, YY. CreationDate is in short date format</--> {CreditNoteString}_{UserName}_{FirstName}_{LastName}_{Mm}_{YY}
